headline: Backblaze Q3 2025 Drive Stats: Rethinking Failure, Celebrating High-Capacity Drive Strength
summary: SAN MATEO, Calif., November 11, 2025--Backblaze, Inc. (Nasdaq: BLZE), the high-performance cloud storage platform for the AI era, today released its Q3 2025 Drive Stats report, analyzing the performance and reliability of 328,348 hard drives deployed across its global data centers.
